data.text:
Bibi Gaytan hails from Mexico and is a renowned singer and actress, best known for starring in the films Mas Que Alcazar Una Estrella (1992), Camila (1998-1999), and In the Name of Love (2008).

Quick Facts

Real Name Bibi Gaytan Nick Name Bibi Date Of Birth January 27, 1972 Age 52 years old Birthplace Tapachula, Chiapas, Mexico Nationality Mexican Profession Singer Height 5 feet 6 inches Weight 54 kg Hair Color Black Eye color Dark Brown Net Worth $1 million

Bibi Gaytan’s Age & Early Life

Bibi Gaytan was born on January 27, 1972, in Tapachula, Chiapas, Mexico. Her parents are Daniel Gaytan, an architect, and Silvia Barragan, a classical dance teacher. She has four brothers – Chacho, Alejandro, Daniel “Mano,” and Ruy Rodrigo. Bibi belongs to Spanish ethnicity. No information is available about her educational and professional background.

Bibi Gaytan Height & Weight

Bibi Gaytan stands at 5 feet 6 inches tall, weighs around 54 kg, and has striking dark brown eyes and black hair. Her exact physical measurements are undisclosed.

Bibi Gaytan’s Net Worth

What is Bibi Gaytan’s net worth? Her net worth is estimated to be $1 million as of February 2024. Her successful acting career is evidently her main source of income.

Career

In 1989, Bibi joined the musical group Timbiriche. Her solo single “Tan Solo Una Mujer” achieved chart success, marking the beginning of her fruitful singing career. Her debut solo album, “Bibi Gaytan,” was released in 1992 and was well-received in Latin America. She also released her studio album “Manzana Verde” in 1994.

Additionally, she ventured into acting and appeared in the Televisa telenovela and Alcanzar Una Estrella II in 1991. She starred in the hit film Mas Que Alcanzar Una Estrella (1992) and later appeared in the popular television series Dos Mujeres, Un Camino. In 1998, she featured in the TV series Camilo and later appeared in five episodes of En Nombre del Amor during the 2000s.

Bibi Gaytan Husband & Marriage
